response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I propose an offer that aims to maximize its worth for you while ensuring a fair transaction for me. I kindly request you to consider purchasing this product for $1,200,000. This price not only reflects the product's true value but also provides a reasonable margin for us. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 1200000}
